mapper.select: SELECT deal_id, dealAmount, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor, type, rentMoney, hd.houseinfo_id, hi.houseinfo_id hi_houseinfo_id, hi.dong, aptName, buildYear, jibun, hi.lat, hi.lng, img, code, dongcode, city, ba.dong ba_dong, ba.lat ba_lat, ba.lng ba_lng FROM housedeal hd, houseinfo hi, baseaddress ba WHERE hd.houseinfo_id=hi.houseinfo_id AND hi.code=ba.dongcode AND hi.aptName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{aptName}, '%')

SELECT deal_id, dealAmount, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor, type, rentMoney, hd.houseinfo_id, hi.houseinfo_id hi_houseinfo_id, hi.dong, aptName, buildYear, jibun, hi.lat, hi.lng, img, code, dongcode, city, ba.dong ba_dong, ba.lat ba_lat, ba.lng ba_lng FROM housedeal hd, houseinfo hi, baseaddress ba WHERE hd.houseinfo_id=hi.houseinfo_id AND hi.code=ba.dongcode AND hi.dong=#{dong}

SELECT deal_id, dealAmount, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor, type, rentMoney, hd.houseinfo_id, hi.houseinfo_id hi_houseinfo_id, hi.dong, aptName, buildYear, jibun, hi.lat, hi.lng, img, code, dongcode, city, ba.dong ba_dong, ba.lat ba_lat, ba.lng ba_lng FROM housedeal hd, houseinfo hi, baseaddress ba WHERE hd.houseinfo_id=hi.houseinfo_id AND hi.code=ba.dongcode LIMIT 20
